description:
🔘 Cool Toggle – A Fully Customizable Toggle Switch for Bubble

Bring sleek and interactive toggles to your Bubble app with Cool Toggle — a modern, highly customizable plugin that lets you add beautiful toggle switches with ease.

Perfect for settings panels, preferences, forms, feature flags, and more.

⚙️ Key Features:

🌈 Fully customizable:

Toggle size (width & height)

Background and button colors

Optional shadow for a polished look

🧠 Dynamic states:

is_enabled (yes/no) state to track toggle status in real time

🚀 Built-in events:

Enabled, Disabled, and Toggled – perfect for workflow triggers

⚡ Workflow actions:

Enable, Disable, and Toggle the switch programmatically

Minimal, intuitive, and fully flexible — Cool Toggle fits perfectly in any modern UI.

Start adding delightful toggles to your app today! ✨

A Bubble plugin created by We Prog Dev.
